mapper.insert:
select ONE_PRODUCT_seq.nextval from dual
insert into product (pno,type,deposit,rent,manage,area,floar,totalfloor,room,shower,addr1,addr2,addr3,lat,lng,picture,thumbnail,contents,fulloption,email) values(#{pno},#{type},#{deposit},#{rent},#{manage},#{area},#{floar},#{totalfloor},#{room},#{shower},#{addr1},#{addr2},#{add3},#{lat},#{lan},#{picture},#{thumbnail},#{contents},#{fulloption},#{email})
